name: Neopraxia (NaNo18 Demo)
description:
This demo is now greatly outdated, but remains available to download for those interested in the game's history. A separate page for the final game will be created in the future. For progress updates check out the official website or the development log.

In the distant future, the last of humanity live in a single underground nation, with their lives regulated by the government to ensure collective prosperity and perpetuity.

Welcome to Antiquity, the place where monsters are born.

Premise

Left alone, monsters will attack and drain precious energy from Antiquity's intermetro power grid. The Civil Department assigns certain citizens the role of 'hunter', who hunt down the monsters.

Rion is an extremely skilled hunter who finds his role dull. After sharing this with his few friends, they suggest that he try dating.

Information

Made with Ren'Py 6.99.14.2.3333. CC0 assets used are uncredited. Non-original and non-CC0 assets used are credited ingame.

This demo only goes up to Act I. Act II and III coming in the future maybe.
